item.title: 投资者关注关税风险，期货价格下滑
item.description: 美国股指期货周二下滑，标志着新季度的黯淡开局，因为投资者正努力应对特朗普政府将于周三宣布的全面新关税的不确定性。【原文：U.S. stock index futures slipped on Tuesday, marking a gloomy start to the new quarter, as investors grappled with uncertainty around the Trump administration's sweeping new tariffs set to be announced on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国卢克希尔正考虑今年在香港上市
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的人士称，苹果 AirPods 的制造商中国立思辰精密工业公司正在考虑今年在香港上市，这为近期中国内地上市公司纷纷考虑在香港上市的情况再添一例。【原文：China's Luxshare Precision Industry , maker of Apple AirPods, is considering a Hong Kong listing this year, three people familiar with the matter said, adding to a recent run of mainland China-listed companies eyeing a Hong Kong float.】

item.title: 关税预示美国第一季度汽车销量将小幅增长
item.description: 本周二，美国汽车制造商的数据将显示，由于需求稳定，今年前三个月美国汽车销量可能有所上升，同时该行业正在为唐纳德-特朗普总统最新关税政策的影响做准备。【原文：U.S. auto sales likely inched higher in the first three months of the year on steady demand, data from the carmakers will show on Tuesday, as the industry braces for the fallout of President Donald Trump's latest tariffs.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称制药业游说特朗普分阶段征收关税
item.description: 据四位熟悉讨论情况的消息人士透露，制药商正在游说美国总统唐纳德-特朗普分阶段对进口医药产品征收关税，希望减少关税带来的冲击，并留出时间转移生产。【原文：Drugmakers are lobbying U.S. President Donald Trump to phase in tariffs on imported pharmaceutical products in hopes of reducing the sting from the charges and to allow time to shift manufacturing, according to four sources familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 据《华盛顿邮报》报道，特朗普的助手起草了一份提案，要求对大部分进口到美国的商品征收至少 20% 的关税
item.description: 据《华盛顿邮报》周二报道，白宫助手起草了一份提案，拟对大部分进口到美国的商品征收约 20% 的关税。【原文：White House aides have drafted a proposal to impose tariffs of around 20% on most imports to the United States, the Washington Post reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 律师事务所聘请前特斯拉律师和顶级保守派诉讼律师参与特朗普之战
item.description: 在特朗普政府以一波行政命令打击美国律师事务所之际，三家挑战这些命令的律师事务所聘请了特斯拉前总法律顾问、长期保守派诉讼律师和其他顶级律师作为他们的代表。【原文：As the Trump administration strikes at U.S. law firms with a wave of executive orders, three firms challenging those orders have retained a former Tesla general counsel, a longtime conservative litigator and other top lawyers to represent them.】

item.title: 阿根廷国际货币基金组织（IMF）协议进展未能扫除外汇阴霾
item.description: 阿根廷与国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）的 200 亿美元新项目可能已进入最后阶段，但该协议迄今仍未能消除交易商的焦虑和该国比索货币前景的不确定性阴霾。【原文：Argentina and the International Monetary Fund may be on the home stretch over a $20 billion new program, but the deal has so far failed to dispel traders' anxiety and a haze of uncertainty around the outlook for the country's peso currency.】

item.title: 美国参议院共和党人将就特朗普税收计划征求裁判意见
item.description: 美国参议院共和党人本周将要求参议院的无党派裁判员对一项有争议的计划进行权衡，该计划旨在使唐纳德-特朗普总统即将到期的2017年减税政策永久化，批评人士称这可能导致数万亿美元的额外债务。【原文：U.S. Senate Republicans will ask their chamber's nonpartisan referee this week to weigh in on a controversial plan to make President Donald Trump's expiring 2017 tax cuts permanent, which critics say could lead to trillions of dollars in additional debt.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，Arm最近寻求收购Alphawave，以获得人工智能芯片技术
item.description: 据三位熟悉内情的消息人士透露，软银旗下的芯片技术供应商Arm Holdings最近寻求收购英国半导体知识产权供应商Alphawave公司，以获得一项对构建自己的人工智能处理器至关重要的技术。【原文：SoftBank-owned chip tech provider Arm Holdings recently sought to acquire Alphawave , a UK-based supplier of semiconductor intellectual property, to secure a crucial technology that is crucial for building its own artificial-intelligence processors, according to three sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 全球交易活动令人失望，并购收入因特朗普征收关税而下降
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普挑起的全球贸易战以及随之而来的市场动荡，使银行家们对华尔街交易大年强劲开局的预测大打折扣。【原文：A global trade war kicked off by U.S. President Donald Trump and the ensuing market turmoil soured bankers' predictions for a robust start to a blockbuster year for deals on Wall Street.】

item.title: Couche-Tard 和 7-Eleven 在店铺剥离计划上面临早期障碍
item.description: 便利店连锁巨头 Couche-Tard 和 Seven & i 正在采取措施剥离它们在北美共同拥有的数千家门店，以便在潜在合并之前减轻监管机构的担忧。【原文：Convenience store chain giants Couche-Tard and Seven & i , who are taking steps to divest thousands of stores they collectively own in North America to ease regulatory concerns ahead of a potential merger, are faced with an early test for the plan - attracting rival suitors for the stores.】

item.title: 中国承诺对牛肉关税调查作出公正裁决
item.description: 中国承诺将在对牛肉进口的调查听证会后做出 "公正客观 "的裁决，如果发现国内生产商面临风险，这一审查可能会导致更高的关税或进口限制。【原文：China pledged to deliver a "fair and objective" ruling following a hearing in its ongoing investigation into beef imports, a review that could lead to higher tariffs or import limits if domestic producers are found to be at risk.】

item.title: 特斯拉 3 月份在丹麦的销量同比下降 65.6
item.description: 丹麦移动公司（Mobility Denmark）周二提供的登记数据显示，特斯拉 3 月份在丹麦的新车销量比去年同期下降了 65.6%，降至 593 辆。【原文：Tesla's sale of new cars in Denmark fell by 65.6% in March from the same month a year ago to 593 vehicles, registration data from Mobility Denmark showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国要求银行加大对科技企业的信贷支持
item.description: 国家金融监督管理局周二发表声明称，中国将鼓励银行增加向科技企业发放信用贷款和中长期贷款。【原文：China will encourage banks to increase the issuance of credit loans and medium- and long-term loans to technology enterprises, the National Financial Regulatory Administration said in a statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: 在特朗普征收关税之前，美国将印度繁琐的进口要求视为贸易壁垒
item.description: 在美国计划的对等关税生效前两天发布的一份报告中，美国对印度日益增多且繁琐的进口质量要求及其众多贸易壁垒表示担忧。【原文：The United States has flagged concerns over India's increasing and burdensome import-quality requirements, among its many barriers to trade, in a report released two days before planned U.S. reciprocal tariffs take effect.】

item.title: 日本顶级航运公司总裁表示，担心美国关税会减缓货运量
item.description: 日本最大的航运公司日本邮船（NYK）总裁表示，该公司担心美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税措施可能会推高汽车和日用品的成本，从而抑制消费需求并减缓货物流动。【原文：Nippon Yusen (NYK) , Japan's largest shipping line, is concerned that U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs could push up the cost of automobiles and daily goods, denting consumer demand and slowing cargo flows, its president said.】

item.title: 三星电子任命移动业务主管为消费与移动部门临时主管
item.description: 三星电子（Samsung Electronics）周二任命其移动业务主管卢泰文（Roh Tae-moon）为公司消费者和移动业务代理主管，其前任韩钟熙（Han Jong-Hee）已于一周前去世。【原文：Samsung Electronics appointed on Tuesday its mobile chief Roh Tae-moon as acting head of the company's consumer and mobiles business, following the death of his predecessor, Han Jong-Hee, a week ago.】

item.title: LG 能源解决方案与通用汽车的合资公司向美国子公司出售 20 亿美元资产
item.description: LG 能源解决方案公司周二表示，其与通用汽车的合资企业将向通用汽车的美国分公司出售价值 20 亿美元的资产。【原文：LG Energy Solution said on Tuesday that its joint venture with General Motors would sell $2 billion worth of assets to its U.S. unit.】

item.title: 阿尔斯通延长纽约肯尼迪机场空中列车合同
item.description: 法国火车制造商阿尔斯通集团周二表示，该公司已签署了一份为期七年的续约合同，用于运营和维护其在纽约肯尼迪机场的空中列车。【原文：Train maker Alstom has signed a seven-year contract extension for the operations and maintenance of its AirTrains at the John F. Kennedy airport in New York, the French group said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，SpaceX 希望在越南建立拥有多个地面站的星链（Starlink）中心
item.description: 两名知情人士告诉路透社，SpaceX 正在越南为 Starlink 卫星准备一个地面站，并计划建造更多的地面站。【原文：SpaceX is readying a ground station in Vietnam for Starlink satellites and plans many more, two people with knowledge of the talks told Reuters, in a move that would herald its launch in the country and would help authorities police internet traffic.】

item.title: 汉莎航空表示，尽管边境政策更加严格，但美国预订量没有下降
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司（Lufthansa）财务总监表示，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）采取了更严格的边境政策，但该公司往返美国的机票预订量并未出现下降。【原文：German airline Lufthansa has not experienced a decline in bookings to and from the United States despite a stricter border policy under President Donald Trump, its finance chief said.】

item.title: 英国最高法院审理 "秘密 "汽车融资委员会案，银行面临焦虑等待
item.description: 本周二，英国最高法院将开庭审理一起有关汽车金融佣金的上诉案，英国金融监管部门将审议一项向消费者支付数十亿英镑赔偿金的计划，各大银行将焦急地关注着这起上诉案。【原文：Major banks will be anxiously watching an appeal over motor finance commissions, which begins at the UK's Supreme Court on Tuesday as Britain's financial watchdog considers a scheme to pay out billions of pounds in compensation to consumers.】

item.title: 分析师报告称，梅赛德斯-奔驰在加征关税前在美国储备库存
item.description: 据分析师指出，梅赛德斯-奔驰公司高管在周一的电话会议上向分析师表示，梅赛德斯-奔驰正在美国批发市场和经销商处增加库存，以应对4月3日开始征收的关税。【原文：Mercedes-Benz is building up inventory levels in the U.S. at the wholesale level and at dealer lots to get ahead of tariffs due to be collected from April 3, executives told analysts on a call on Monday, according to notes by analysts.】

item.title: 据 Air Current 报道，波音公司将 737 Max 的月产量降至 31 架
item.description: 据美国《Air Current》网站周二报道，波音公司因机翼生产延误，将737 MAX飞机的月产量从38架减至31架。【原文：Boeing slowed the production of 737 MAX airplanes to 31 per month from 38 over wing production delays, the Air Current website reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the progress of the planemaker's Renton, Washington factory.】

item.title: 中国小米称在致命事故后积极与警方合作
item.description: 中国小米公司周二表示，在 3 月 29 日一辆 SU7 汽车发生致命事故后，该公司正积极与警方合作，并移交了驾驶和系统数据。【原文：China's Xiaomi said on Tuesday that it was actively cooperating with police after a fatal accident of an SU7 car on March 29 and handed over driving and system data.】

item.title: 欧洲 "解放日 "前的深呼吸
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行维持利率稳定，警告 "明显的 "全球风险
item.description: 澳大利亚央行周二一如市场普遍预期维持现金利率稳定，并表示尽管美国关税风险可能拖累全球经济增长，但央行对经济前景仍持谨慎态度。【原文：Australia's central bank on Tuesday left its cash rate steady as widely expected, saying it was still cautious about the outlook, although the risk is U.S. tariffs could be a drag on global growth.】

item.title: 韩国监管机构质疑韩华航空航天公司发行 25 亿美元股票的目的
item.description: 韩国金融市场监督机构周二表示，韩华航空航天公司需要更好地解释拟议中的 3.6 万亿韩元（24.6 亿美元）股权融资如何与更广泛的公司重组计划相匹配。【原文：South Korea's financial market watchdog said on Tuesday that Hanwha Aerospace needed to better explain how a proposed 3.6 trillion won ($2.46 billion) equity raising fits with a broader plan to restructure the company.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国交易公司 Jane Street 寻求迅速扩大香港办公空间
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的人士称，全球最大的量化交易公司和做市商之一简街公司正计划大幅增加香港的办公面积。【原文：Jane Street, one of the world's largest quant trading firms and market makers, is planning a sharp increase in Hong Kong office space, two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 特朗普关税计划引发通胀担忧，黄金创历史新高
item.description: 由于担心美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的对等关税可能会助长通胀压力并阻碍经济增长，避险需求推动金价在周二创下历史新高。【原文：Gold prices hit a record peak on Tuesday, as concerns that U.S. President Donald Trump's reciprocal tariffs might fuel inflationary pressures and impede economic growth drove safe-haven demand.】
